subject: New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Eleven days after competing in the New York City Marathon, a 41-year-old man died Thursday, race organizers announced in a statement released Friday afternoon. He was the third runner from a field of nearly 40,000 to die after this year’s race. The organizers, the New York Road Runners, did not release his name.
